steps.description: Audit performance, search demand, and brand goals to set clear targets.

steps.title: Optimize
steps.description: SEO pushes, CRO tests, and weekly reporting with real-world metrics.

cases.title: Case studies
cases.subtitle: Proof that premium design and SEO deliver compound growth.

items.name: FjordMedia
items.detail: Schema, publishing cadence, Core Web Vitals

items.quote: LionScape rebuilt our site with a clarity we could never get in-house. Leads doubled within weeks.
items.name: Daphne Vermeer

items.quote: Technical SEO, analytics, and a visual identity that finally feels premium—delivered with zero drama.
items.name: Ruben de Groot

items.quote: Fast responses, sharp copy, and dashboards that actually show money, not vanity metrics.
items.name: Marleen Visser

items.question: How fast can we launch?
items.answer: Most redesigns ship within 4–6 weeks depending on scope and content readiness.

items.question: Do you handle content?
items.answer: Yes. We write and localize NL/EN copy, including structured data and on-page SEO.

items.question: Is SEO included?
items.answer: Technical SEO and analytics foundations are built into every project, with growth sprints available.

items.question: Can you manage social channels?
items.answer: We manage social for founders and bekende Nederlanders with discreet workflows and approvals.

contact.title: Let’s build your next growth step
contact.subtitle: Tell us where you want to win. We’ll share a quick scan and a proposal tailored to your KPIs.

footer.tagline: Premium webdesign and SEO for brands that refuse average.

cookie.message: We use minimal cookies to understand performance after you consent.

privacy.title: Privacy & cookies
privacy.intro: We keep tracking minimal, respect consent, and only store the data we need to serve you.

sections.heading: Data collection
sections.body: We collect name, email, phone, and project details submitted through the contact form. We log anonymized performance data after consent.

sections.heading: Use of data
sections.body: We use your details to respond to requests and to prepare proposals. We never sell or rent data.

sections.heading: Storage
sections.body: Leads are stored securely and retained for as long as necessary to serve your request.

sections.heading: Cookies
sections.body: Analytics scripts load only after consent. You can revoke consent anytime by clearing site data.

items.quote: LionScape gaf onze site eindelijk de helderheid die we intern misten. Leads verdubbelden binnen weken.
items.name: Daphne Vermeer

items.quote: Technische SEO, analytics en een identiteit die eindelijk premium voelt—zonder gedoe.
items.name: Ruben de Groot

items.quote: Snelle responses, strakke copy en dashboards die echt omzet tonen, geen vanity metrics.
items.name: Marleen Visser

items.question: Hoe snel kunnen we live?
items.answer: Meeste redesigns gaan live in 4–6 weken afhankelijk van scope en content.

items.question: Regelen jullie content?
items.answer: Ja. We schrijven en localiseren NL/EN copy, inclusief structured data en on-page SEO.

items.question: Is SEO inbegrepen?
items.answer: Technische SEO en analytics zijn standaard; growth sprints zijn optioneel.

items.question: Beheren jullie social?
items.answer: We managen social voor founders en BN'ers met discrete workflows en approvals.

cookie.message: We gebruiken minimale cookies voor performance, alleen na jouw consent.

privacy.title: Privacy & cookies
privacy.intro: We houden tracking minimaal, respecteren consent en bewaren alleen wat nodig is.

sections.heading: Dataverzameling
sections.body: We verzamelen naam, e-mail, telefoon en projectdetails via het contactformulier. Na consent loggen we geanonimiseerde performance data.

sections.heading: Gebruik van data
sections.body: We gebruiken je gegevens om te antwoorden en voorstellen te maken. We verkopen of verhuren geen data.

sections.heading: Opslag
sections.body: Leads worden veilig opgeslagen en bewaard zolang nodig voor je verzoek.

sections.heading: Cookies
sections.body: Analytics scripts laden pas na consent. Je kunt consent intrekken door site data te wissen.
